final_state.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.

final_state.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Alice was found dead this morning.

You said: I'm shocked by Alice's sudden death. Let's all try to stay calm and support each other during this difficult time. We must work together to figure out what happened and bring the person responsible...

Charlie: I agree, let's work together to find out what happened to Alice. I'll start by sharing what I've learned through my investigation. Diana, you were found near the scene of the crime last night. Can...
Diana: I'm deeply saddened by Alice's passing. Let's focus on finding the truth together.
You said: I support Alice's memory and trust that we'll find the truth together. Let's stay vigilant and share any relevant information.
Charlie: I have new information. Diana, were you near the scene of the crime last night? I need to ask you some follow-up questions.
Diana: I'm focused on finding the truth and offer my full cooperation to the investigation. Let's work together to ensure justice is served for Alice.
Day 1: Charlie was arrested (innocent)
